Description: I played the guitar for about 3 months. The guitar works perfect, nothing is wrong with it. The guitar has some light wear but still a really beautiful and amazing guitar! Look at all the pictures and you will see the condition of this guitar. I am also including a Gibson strap, several packs of strings and a capo that worked well with this guitar. You will see everything in the pictures, everything in the pictures is included. I took pictures to make it look it's worst. I am the original owner. The guitar is completely original, I did not change or modify anything. Gibson Limited Edition Run SG STD 24Your playing will reach new horizons with the limited-edition 24-Fret Gibson SG Standard. Constructed with the classic tonewood combination of a mahogany body and mahogany neck topped with a rosewood fretboard, this SG ups the ante with its versatile combination of a Firebird mini humbucker in the neck and 57 Classic humbucker in the bridge. Expanding on this guitar's already versatile and dynamic tone, push-pull pots give you the option of coil-tapping for crisp single-coil sounds. Looking for a guitar that stands out? The Limited Edition 24-Fret Gibson SG Standard is available for a limited time, and in limited quantities -- so this guitar is destined to become a legend! Features:- Mahogany body- Mahogany neck- 24-fret rosewood fretboard- Firebird Mini Humbucker in the neck position- 57 Classic humbucker in the bridge position- 1965 SG Standard style "large" pickguard - Push/Pull pot for coil tap- Hardshell case included I will have it packed professionally at FedEx and ship it with FedEx Home Delivery (About 5 business days or less). I will send the tracking number to your Ebay email and the estimated delivery date. If I get your order before 1:00 PM (eastern), I will have it packed and shipped that day. After 1:00 PM I will ship it the next business day. If you have any questions, send me a message.
Title: 2014 Gibson Limited Edition Run SG Standard 24 Fret Electric Guitar
